website_summaries.verdict: Packed with live flora probiotics and oligofructose prebiotic to help regulate gut function.
pros: No shellfish, gluten, lactose, wheat, or soy
Helps some consumers with sugar cravings and yeast infections
cons: Uncoated pearl-shaped tablets can be difficult for some users to swallow
Pearls are more "garbanzo bean" in size
Some users did not notice benefits after taking for a short period

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny pearls. They’re very easy to swallow, just take with a drink. Doesn’t upset my stomach at all. Great pro + prebiotic! Glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: It is good and convenient to take it once a day not twice a day!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is better than I expected. Although the amount of probiotic affects differently person by person, this product seems to be good to me since it also includes prebiotics that are good ingredient for beneficial bacteria in intestines.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works when nothing else did for reflux..
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well but I always had to chase it with a big glass of water as it would stick in the back of my throat. Latest order feedback I used one bottle then stopped because I didn't think I needed probiotics anymore as my acid reflux had subsided. 3 months later my reflux is back. My wife pointed out that the one thing which helped were these pearls. Hence the reorder. The only thing to be aware of is that they always stick when you swallow them, if you dry swallow pills like me you will need to chase with water as I do now. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NML

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading discription of the product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was of the impression that the product I'm ordering was a combination of Prebiotic and Probiotic and the name "Earth's Pearl Probiotic and Prebiotic". This was the very reason why I chose it instead of the others that were also being advertised. I was so disappointed when read the label after I got it that only said "Probiotic". Your ad is definitely very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Diggs

customer_reviews.title: I Luv Pearls!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Due to Fibromyalgia I had IBS. I have tried other probiotics to no avail. Then I read about a combination of Probiotics and PREBIOTICS that one should use as well. these contain both. NOW I don't worry about those accidents if I am away from home. NOW I can at last go away from home and be normal. WILL TAKE THESE ALL THE TIME. Only have to take ONE a day and they need NO REFRIDGERATION. For me they work wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Silly Willey

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews
customer_reviews.text: I used many different types of probiotics and never experienced any problem, but I used this product I got serious allergy symptoms and went to the hospital because I was not able to breath. The emergence Dr told me not to use it again and since I stoped taking it all the symptoms gonna. Never recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud Mahrous

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had severe stomach and GI problems due to gallstones bladder removal and for years I had it stabilized at 20 billion. Anyway I was running low and ran across this product and have been miserable for weeks. I gave myself a couple weeks to adjust to the unit difference, but I shouldn't be severely constipated and when I finally go I'm in the old severe, wall pushing, bent over, barely breathing pain. This product is horrible. Seriously I'm not being paid by anyone. I'm just an experienced gall bladder sufferer. Avoid this POS pill. It does not break down. Anyone claiming that it does clearly never has had a good pill or has a minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Amy

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY STOMACH WORSE
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on the reviews. Well the reviews were not correct! After taking for the first day developed terrible stomach pains and horrific gas. Thought maybe it was something that I ate that day....nope, kept taking for 4 more days and every day the same. I tried to return but the seller does not accept returns. Waste of money, and 5 days of discomfort. Going back to my regular digestive enzymes (alot more money but worth it). Save yourself pain and money and do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Generosa

customer_reviews.title: This is my second bottle. I still don't feel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. I still don't feel as if there have been dramatic changes, but the subtle improvements in my general regularity are noticeable. In fact, they worked well enough for me that I have started giving them to our dog. She is a 13 year old lab and hasn't had any digestive upsets since I started giving her one pearl every two or three days.
customer_reviews.author: cm4bleenmb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $20
customer_reviews.text: I have never used such a bad probiotic as this one . What a waste of $20! Since the day I started taking them I have experienced extreme indigestion and constant bloating. After eating a meal I immediately get super gassy as I cannot break down anything. I burp constantly and my stomach feels like it’s under attack. I have been taking different probiotics for the last 10 years or so and this is a sugar pill or a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Received an opened degraded bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these for over 6 months. My husband takes them. We had been happy with them. He used the first bottle of this order and used them. Today opened the second bottle and it had been opened before and was degraded in color and texture. Clearly a returned bottle sent to us. The bottle was a year older than the other one. I have pictures of all of this. I wish i knew how to get a hold of the company. This should have been responded too.
customer_reviews.author: Csfla400

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I had developed multiple G.I. issues, food sensitivities, and severe lactose intolerance to the point I was unable to consume even a small glass of milk (which I love). After about two weeks of starting these probiotics the severe bloating I was having stopped . I slowly started adding small of amounts of dairy to my diet and lo and behold I was tolerating it well. After two months of taking the probiotic I find I am able to eat and drink everything again. The severe bloating and pain associated with that is gone . I would highly recommend anyone complaining of milk intolerance bloating to give these probiotics a try they've literally changed my life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Swallowing Pebbles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product via subscribe and save believing that the small round "pearls" would be easy to swallow. Not so. Because of their unforgiving surface (rock-hard) and the impressions left by the mold in which they are formed (a slightly raised "belt" that encircles each "pearl") swallowing one is akin to what it must be like when swallowing a small pebble. I'm sure that their probiotic qualities are on a par with most of the other products but I have cancelled my subscribe and save order because the thought of washing down pebbles daily for the foreseeable future is daunting. If swallowing small stones doesn't bother you, then the product might be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCARY: VERY HARD TO SWALLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the small, round size, these keep getting stuck in my throat, and for many others, too. I make sure to wet the pill thoroughly in my mouth, and swallow with a giant gulp of water...but it gets stuck 50% of the time and can make you panic. When it finally goes down after being stuck, it hurts like hell. I'm going to have to crush the rest of these with a hammer and mix with water or something. I'm gonna have to buy something else when this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Leena C.

customer_reviews.title: Here's the deal...
customer_reviews.text: I held off writing a review until I could actually see if there is any positive feedback I can provide. I've been using this for almost one month. Before taking these probiotics, I had major stomach issues as in diarrhea almost EVERYDAY. Within DAYS it was gone. The diarrhea was a chronic problem. I had tried other probiotics with little, if any, good results. Love this stuff so much I did the "subscribe and save". Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooksie

customer_reviews.title: Bloating, difficulty breathing, and discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: I took a serving as instructed by directions and I felt bloated with abdominal discomfort within 15-20 minutes of taking it. Last night, August 20th, I took one pill and started having difficulty breathing, bloating, and constipation. The seller does not allow refunds which makes this experience even worse. Because of all this, I need to leave a one-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Elann

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 weeks now, and I haven't really noticed a difference in my stomach. I have IBS which I haven't really found to be helped very much if any by this. I am going to finish out the bottle but if I don't see any change I won't re-buy. That said, I didn't notice any adverse side-effects, and I think the reviews on here complaining about the pearl size / getting stuck in one's throat at a bit dramatic. I recommend giving it a try and seeing if it works for you, I'll update the review if I notice any change.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Smashing

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing....works very well. Originally bought in prep for a major surgery and have continued taking every single day. Used to have occasional diarrhea and stomach pain, now no problems at all! Makes my belly look flatter too I think. Small note though....the 1st few days you start taking it you may have some diarrhea and discomfort but that is just the live probiotic strains starting to get to your gut and get everything into it's natural rhythm again. LOVE how well this works!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: easier to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I take a probiotic daily, usually in the form of a huge oblong pill or capsule...saw these "pearls", thought, why not? So glad I tried them!! I did not review this product until I had been taking it for 2 full weeks, to make sure I was giving an accurate review, but let me tell you, I really like these pearls!! Easy to swallow, no tummy discomfort (yes, the previous "store" brand gave me an upset tummy!) and I accidentally forgot to take it for 2 days and could really tell a difference in how I felt! I will 100% for sure be re-purchasing these pearls!!
customer_reviews.author: supermom (cape not included)

customer_reviews.title: I’ll go back to an old brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken many probiotics and these do nothing. The small round shape actually makes them so much harder to swallow than an oval shaped pill.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Paris Adams

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product consistently for a over a month ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product consistently for a over a month and have not seen any changes in a regulated digestives system.
customer_reviews.author: SKJ

customer_reviews.title: best thing for your tummy
customer_reviews.text: This is the HOLY GRAIL of probiotics. If you have any digestion, gut, bloating, issues , then PLEASE order these and have them on AUTOSHIP, your stomach will thank you for it. I LOVE these, they calmed my bloat and painful tummy within one week of taking them. I don't feel pain when eating anymore. They are very reasonably priced for the quality and the results they give. Yes, they are round and small, but they are very easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not the results I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: After investigating prebiotic/probiotic products available through Amazon, I bought this product based on reviews and tried it for about 3 weeks. This was a bad mistake for me. My digestive system has been so disrupted since I quit taking. Probably the worst health care purchase I have made online ever. My system was definitely not compatible with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Better ones for the price
customer_reviews.text: So I think that my body was still trying to adjust to these but they for the most part were not helping my digestion. I gave them two weeks and my stomach did not stop cramping and I had consistent diarrhea. I decided on another brand that started working after the 2nd day. I'm giving the rest of these to my mom to see if they work for her. They are definitely not worth the price. You need more CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Mel1975

customer_reviews.title: Terrific probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific probiotic. I ordered this initially for my mom to take since she is on Metformin and it causes horrible diarrhea at times and a probiotic is recommended. These are small and easy for her to take. I have started taking them as well and have noticed a huge benefit. I would often become bloated throughout the afternoon no matter how much or little I ate and this has eliminated that completely! This is the 3rd time we have ordered this product and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: jessa carlyle

customer_reviews.title: Worse probiotics ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this probiotic to aid in digestion. These did absolutely nothing. In fact these stopped me up and made me feel horrible. Even though they are small, they were hard to swallow. It felt rough going down and had an unpleasant taste. I was better off with the probiotics at Wal-Mart!
customer_reviews.author: TORI

customer_reviews.title: Has improved my life with IBS
customer_reviews.text: I've never taken a probiotic before but was suffering majorly from IBS symptoms. The IBS symptoms stress me, and the stress makes my IBS worse. Within days of starting these probiotics I started seeing improvement. The pills themselves are easy to swallow, and I can pop a few in my mouth at once. (I generally take two per day) I am not totally symptom free, but I feel much better since starting these a few months ago. I have forgotten for a few days, or one time I had to go a few days because I did not order them soon enough, and it doesn't take long at all to realize how much they help me.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving this because I kept getting emails to ask me to rate this product. I haven't had it that long yet so I don't feel I could give a very good testimony as to the benefit of the product. I do plan on continuing to take them for awhile to see how well the product does. After that, I will return and give update.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Melton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for my problems!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had digestive problems for as long as I can remember! I'm 27 and have had two kids - I eat plenty of fiber, drink plenty of water and have very gassy digestive issues lol. Taking this every night has helped me go almost every day, and its AMAZING. The only probiotic that has ever worked for me. I'm sure it depends on the person, but this definitely works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Calla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inversion
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I am treating my heartburn and gastric reflux with different probiotics and digestive enzymes, without any results, investigating these Pearls I read the customer reviews and thought they would help, I bought them and started taking 4 daily, at week I started to seeing a big change in my stomach, I could hardly eat anything anymore, everything hurt me, I feel so good taking those pearls that I am another, it is incredible even my husband takes them, thanks to the seller and Amazon for this wonderful product and Miraculous, I'll buy another bottle, I feel great
customer_reviews.author: Maria de Jesus Oropesa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow without a big drink
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned, these pearls get stuck at the back of my throat a lot. I've been taking this pill about 2 hours before bed. The first few mornings I had to run to the bathroom as soon as my alarm went off. For a few days after that I was a little gassy, but I think it was just my body asjusting to the pro and prebiotics. I've only been taking these about 2 weeks so I will update once I have been taking them longer.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Not an effective probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: Not an effective probiotic, no benefit after taking it - it was a complete waste of $20 and returns are not allowed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different probiotics and this one is by far an away the best one. I love the little pearls. I have NO IDEA about it all but I can tell you this stuff works. All of the others I have tried over the last bit had no affect. This one... OH YEAH. It really works for me. I will continue to purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: Tiny,goes down easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I have stomach issues from time to time .I was told that I need to eat yogurt but I would buy and eat only once. So I decided to try this and boy am I glad I did.The Pearl's are tiny and go down super easy.I've been taking them for about a week now ,rite before bed time and I haven't had any stomach issues since. I did not get a free bottle or any compensation for this review I'm just a happy customer who found something that works and wanted to share. Maybe it will work for you too.
customer_reviews.author: Ab4thought

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pre/probiotic that I have ever tried where I can tell that it helps my gut! I have been struggling with chronic IBS pain and constipation and this finally made me regular! The bottle says to take up to 3 pearls a day, I took two. One with my first meal of the day and another one before I go to bed at night. They are also so great because they are small and easy to take. The bottle that they come in is also very small which makes it easy for me to just throw them in my purse. I love these pearls, I'm on my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feeling much better!
customer_reviews.text: I recently sent some of my hair into a lab for allergy testing. One of the most interesting results to come off that test was that I am 96% deficient in bacillus coagulans. That means that I don't have much good bacteria in my gut. I panicked! I know that good gut health is incredibly important so I searched for a probiotic and the tiny size of this caught my attention. Because I was so deficient, I started with 2 a day for the first 10 days. I'm happy to say that things are regular now and I'll be dropping off to one a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: USE A VARIETY OF PROBIOTICS PREBIOTICS
customer_reviews.text: Last year when I went to my gynocologist she recommended that as a woman I should use probiotics/prebiotics but, rotate the brands that I use every couple of months. I had tried Earth's Pearl and found using it didn't give me any problems. Easy ball to swallow and now it is time to change off again, so I once again ordered Earth's Pearl. I can't say how they taste, because I just swallow one with a good amount of water. Have a great day and keep healthy! P.S. Great review by my wife!!
customer_reviews.author: MR. P

customer_reviews.title: Benefits seen quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at pre/probiotics for several years. Just didn't know enough to make a purchase. The reviews were convincing on this product so I made my first purchase and will re-order. The was concern about no coating and difficulty swallowing. I found if I take a drink of water first and then take pill with more water there has been no problem swallowing or sticking in my throat. Thank you for a great product made by a family owned business. Congratulations on creating a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better company!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this probiotic to help my 9 year old daughter who is having multiple health issues. I haven't been using them long enough to fully attest to their effectiveness, but I feel confident that they are beneficial. The customer service is amazing! I love knowing it's a small family run business that takes time for their customers and are making/ backing a product they are passionate about and have seen true results from.
customer_reviews.author: ldb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this instead of the other probiotic I normally purchase on Amazon. This did nothing for me and if you take 3 like the instructions reccomend then it's not even a months supply.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel sanglson

customer_reviews.title: TRULY BEST PROBIOTIC
customer_reviews.text: These probiotic are easy to swallow and have really helped my digestive issues. I found this brand though an Amazon search actually for another probiotic recommended by my doctor's office, however I have been extremely happy with this probiotic. I am taking probiotics after three rounds of antibiotics back-to-back. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product to anyone needing a probiotic during antibiotic treatment or a probiotic just to maintain overall good health.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Colitis sufferers take heed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had cancer and is now in remission. As a result of chemo, he ended up in the hospital three times with various infections which created severe colitis. Thanks to Earth's Pearl Probiotic and many other medications, he is doing quite well. Initially, when he returned home, I gave him three pearls a day. He is now down to two per day and keeps improving. I believe we will soon be able to cut back to just one pearl per day. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret, Oakhurst, CA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried spacing it out to see if this probiotic is the problem and it is. Makes my stomach very bloated and uncomfortable. Tried on several different occasions and after about a half hour my abdomen gets really bloated and painful. Didn’t work for me at all. WARNING! there are no returns on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Small in size and effective
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product for the good reviews and small size. It's not coated so I do have to drink a good gulp of water with it, but that doesn't bother me. The price is comparable to other probiotics and most importantly it works. Although I am otherwise healthy, I do a fair amount of traveling and eating out and I felt I could use some help with digestion. I feel old saying this, but it helps with bloating and regularity! I definitely notice a difference and will continue taking this probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write a review, but these really do work for me. For months I had had back pain. Doctors, chiropractors, pain patches. Had taken other pills similar, nothing. I was reading everything I could get my hands on, and an article on this pill popped up, and I read the reviews. Which were really good, and at this point I was ready to try about anything. Even had acupuncture! What do you know, in a few days the pain was gone. It might not work for everyone, but they work for me. I keep em coming.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I've used most of the bottle at this point and never had any bloating problems. Bowel movements got better after a week or so of once a day use (I may have used twice a day the first few days). Lots of product in the bottle is nice. HOWEVER, it must be stated that having changed my diet to eating more chicken and vegetables with fewer desserts (but not totally removing them. I still eat chocolate and donuts every couple days), and exercising has done way more to steady my digestive system than these or a fiber supplement
customer_reviews.author: Caed Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product, has worked really well and I'm impressed as I've only been using it a week. This company is small but they follow up well with you and provide lots of product information. Make sure to read the story that they include via URL when you order this product from them. Its a quick read, but a heartwarming one and one that shouldn't be missed. Highly recommend this product and the company overall. Will be checking out their other products, as the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these. As a long time sufferer of IBS there are bouts where I literally have pain every day for weeks despite being very strict with diet. The last bout led me to reading about pre-biotics and to this purchase. So far I’ve been taking these for 2 weeks and my stomach feels so much better. I’ve been more “regular” as well. Definitely would recommend (and I already did to a friend).
customer_reviews.author: Anomyous

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to Dr. Gundry PreBiothrive powder
customer_reviews.text: Even as a Gundry MD VIP member, his PreBiothrive product is cost-prohibitive, so I've been on the hunt for a less expensive alternative. Not only is this product affordable, but include probiotics as well. After several weeks, it seems to be performing as well as the Gundry product, and BONUS ... I don't have to mix it into a smoothie or some other beverage. So much more convenient, especially because I travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: PJ in Montana

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I have really, really bad chronic Diarrhea due to meds I take (Metformin). Since I started taking these (one a day), there has been a great relief of that side effect. I don't know if that is just a placebo effect, but it is noticeable. I'm on my fourth bottle, and it is very rare that I stick to a pill or supplement this long. This is one of the few supplements I've ever taken where I actually noticed a difference. SUPER easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: teejay

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics are amazing! Within 3 days of starting these, the bloating and irregularity I'd resigned myself to believing was the "new normal" had disappeared, replaced by a flat tummy and excellent digestion. I take them first thing in the morning, about 30 minutes before my first cup of coffee. The key is to take them every day, preferably at the same time, so you create and reinforce the habit of taking them. That's not hard to do though since these are about the size and shape of a small round bead. Shipped quickly also.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really work
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure this would be of any use, but happily I was wrong - these are great and have made a very positive change in my gut health. Have ordered before and will do so again. Only problem was that they offer a coupon upon reordering, but was not able to access it when I ordered and this needs to be corrected; perhaps they could include a coupon number with the order when delivered that can be included on the order form.
customer_reviews.author: reviewerb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all around Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I (and my parents lol) absolutely love these probiotics!!! They’ve cleared up my parents tummy and bathroom issues pretty much totally my issues are getting better with these I’ve had my issues for so long though it’s obviously going to take a little longer to straighten out than others but I really suggest everyone with tummy and/or bathroom issues try these probiotics but remember if they don’t help in 1 or 2 days of course keep using them sometimes it takes a while to get into some peoples systems as with any meds (learned that from doctors over the years) anyway give them a try.... and the company even appreciates the business they’re awesome as well
customer_reviews.author: The Poet

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd order - and I'm very happy I tried this
customer_reviews.text: "This is my 2nd purchase of this item which I initially ordered because I’ve struggled with diverticulitis for the past few years. Earths Pearls works! If I’m sluggish I take 2 per day or when I’m fine I take 1 per day. I haven’t had any issues with bloating, grassiness, constipation, or irritable bowels. I will continue to take this because I just feel better. Ironically I have more energy too."
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TAKE IF YOU HAVE TYPE 1 OR TYPE 2 DIABETES
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for about a week. I have type 1 diabetes that is very well controlled. I took it in the morning after my breakfast and noticed that my blood glucose level sky-rocketed and remained high for several hours no matter how much insulin I took. I did not immediately think about the probiotic as who would think that could impact blood glucose levels? It wasn't until 3 or 4 days of experiencing the same thing that I skipped a day and blood glucose levels were back to normal. Additionally, I developed heartburn for the first time in my life while taking this. I will not be taking any more. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsse

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Had a lot of tummy issues and this helped me so much. I used to have issues at least every other week. After a month of taking this probiotic and not changing anything else in my diet or habits, my stomach stopped being so moody with cycles of constipation and diarrhea and stomach aches.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Best Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, many Probiotics over the last five or six years, and have always come back to Earth's Pearl. Easy to swallow (it's very small) good price and above all, It works!! It is the only Probiotic I buy now. I have added a Prebiotic and it is a dynamic duo. If you are searching for a Probiotic give Earth's Pearl a try, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pre-probiotic! Really work!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these really work and worked fast! I decided to use these after I had to take post-surgery antibiotics. I waited till the abx were finished and started on these at 1xday. By day 2 my guts were feeling better. By day 5 I felt ‘normal’. I continued to take them till finished. One thing, they make my pee smell different. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with H Pylori bacteria in my stomach and intestines for months now, this pro/pre biotic seems to be really helping I have been taking for a couple of weeks now and am slowly feeling a difference I recommend this as a purchase I feel like my body is benefitting I will definitely be purchasing a second bottle
customer_reviews.author: shannon forrest

customer_reviews.title: Not enteric coated
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were enteric coated I cannot take plantarum directly in my stomach. It makes it hurt so bad I feel like I’m dying and need to go to the emergency room. So I’m gonna throw these out.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nope, nope. Nope.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel like you’re dying these are the probiotics for you! Seriously. Worst pain I’ve ever gone through and I’ve given birth to 2 children. I was googling appendicitis. I was writing my will. I was praying to all the gods. Do. Not. Buy. This. DON’T DO IT. Please, you may not thank me now, but your intestines will be forever grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I have had 3 major surgeries for rectal cancer and have had my intestines out of body my BMs have of course suffered. After trying many probiotics nothing changed until I found this brand. After two weeks my BMs have gone from 2 to 4 (sometimes more) a day to once every 2 days. That in itself is worth. For those that have gone through the samething I also take glutamine which helps by creating mucus in the intestines but these little Pearl's really turned the corner for me. Give it a shot maybe they'll help you also. This company also has great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrud M.

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotics, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for three months.I had taken another brand for about a year. I have not noticed anything “miraculous” but I believe it is a good product at a very reasonable price. I have appreciated not needing to keep them in the refrigerator, it will make it easy to take with me when I travel. They are easy to take and the information that came with the probiotics was very informative. I will be continuing with Earth’s Pearl to keep improving my gut health and digestion. Great customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Olsen-Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great results!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this pre/probiotic for well over a year with great results. Have tried several others in the past with no noticable change. Highly recommend. Also, the seller has always made themselves available to me after purchases with an email to respond to if I have any questions. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE B

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have been on these for over a week and at first I did not feel anything the first few days, but after a week I feel that they are helping my stomach get the good bacteria that it needs. I do like they are in tiny round ball form instead of capsules. This makes them much easier for me to take them along for travel. They are reasonably priced for the two month supply and they company says the way they are made makes them get past the acid in your stomach to provide the good bacteria. I also like that they have multiple strains of probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Helped restore gut health
customer_reviews.text: Searching for a probiotic can be difficult and sometimes it's trial and error to find out what's going to work for you. After reading the reviews, I decided to give this product a try and I've been very happy with the results. My husband and I have been dealing with stomach issues caused from stress for our recent relocation, and within a few days of taking this probiotic, I feel like our bodies are getting more on a normal schedule for us with BM's.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Gal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with seller and Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have ordered from this seller. The shipping is fast and I am very happy with the Probiotics I order from this seller. I feel the Probiotics are a very good value for the price. I have had some digestion problems in the past and have experienced a noticeable improvement after taking Earth's Pearls Probiotics and Prebiotics daily. They're easy to swallow with no unpleasant aftertaste. I highly recommend this seller and Earths Pearls Probiotics and Prebiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Dont know...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was suposed to feel or not feel when taking these. I would say that they are easy to swallow due to their small size. I had some weird stomach responses when taking them so Im not quite sure to make of it. Its the first time taking somethig like this so I'm not sure what to expect. I know I didnt feel like my digestion system was any better off neither did I feel any better physically taking them. Maybe its just me. Reviews were pretty positive for them.
customer_reviews.author: westlaguy

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic arrived dead
customer_reviews.text: Sat on doorstep for the whole day in 90 degree weather. The directions say it must stay below 70 degrees. This effectively renders the probiotic dead. What a waste of money. Such a scam!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Yang

customer_reviews.title: I can enjoy food, again!
customer_reviews.text: For the last 2 years, I've been battling food digestion issues, which includes food allergies and intolerances. Based on consumer reviews, I decided to try Earth's Pearls. I've been taking 4 pearls a day for 12 days now, and I am seeing a marked improvement in how my stomach is digesting food! I feel like I am getting closer to good gut health than I've been in a long time. I will order another bottle before this first one runs out. Only tip, be sure to wet your mouth before you put the pill in and drink a few sips as you swallow, for the the pill is dry. This product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bizprofessor

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best probiotic I have found so far. I definitely notice a difference if I don't take it. I am not going to say it has solved all my health issues but it has helped. I am on my third bottle and will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: R. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Constipation Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have started taking these little gems, the constipation issues I have had for over two years have almost completely gone away. It took a couple of weeks to start working for me, but things are really “moving along“ now. I have tried other probiotics over the last few years, but none had the effect I was hoping for. In fact, some probiotics seemed to constipate me even more. So, you have to find the strains that work best for you. I found mine! To the maker’s of Earth’s Pearls: please do not change this formula, ever.
customer_reviews.author: pvtime

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Probiotic, Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a number of different probiotics to help with my GERD and acid reflux, along with tons of other remedies, medications, and everything in between and these are the only ones that truly work well for me. Probiotics work differently for every person, but these are my go-to favorites and I highly recommend. I’m so grateful they ended some very frustrating issues!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This little miracle pill has helped me tremendously! I take it and a magnesium complex and I am now regular and I have dealt with constipation ALL my life. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Hurts to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find these probiotics at a decent price and I hope they are helping. It's too soon to tell. However, occasionally they scrap the sides of my through when I swallow them even though they are small pills. I think its because of the shape, they are a small ball but have a little ridge around the center, so its just an awkward shape. I never have this problem with other capsules that are much bigger but also smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 5 stars because my gut has not given me any problems since I started taking these. I had so many problems before the worst being bloating. I did make a few other changes at the same time (green drinks) but I do believe the probiotics made all the difference in the world. I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: JoanES

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helping my IBS-D!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from IBS-D for years and after my first pearl, I noticed improvement! I usually avoid food until I’m hungry enough to endure the ensuing misery. After eating, the onset of stomach cramps, pain and bloating followed by a sprint to the bathroom consume the following hour or so. Today I ate a meal without stomach pain for the first time in weeks and I didn’t have to sprint to the bathroom. I almost felt....normal! I know IBS-D has no cure, but for the first time, I have hope for my symptoms. I am so grateful! I highly recommend this to anyone suffering from IBS-D. Try it. It’s definitely helping me!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hoffmann Pilarski

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a nice product!
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be a great product. I am not sure how to tell if they are working. I have been taking them two hours after my antibiotic. I feel like they are lessening the issues normally associated with antibiotic usage. I do not notice any changes but it has only been a few weeks. I like the shape of the pills as they are round. They offer a free bottle after your first purchase and that was a pleasant surprise. The nice emails from them and background on the company information was also useful. Customer service is very responsive as they reply to your inquiries. I am overall satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dainty Tea Lady

customer_reviews.title: Seems To Work
customer_reviews.text: Plus it comes from a nice small company. Good company follow up with emails. Like the concept of the pearls because of their shape and density digesting in the intestines where the bacteria is supposed to be. Very easy to swallow without water. Took a star away because not sure it works better than other products I have used in the past. Like the idea there is a small amount of Prebiotic in there also.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Widen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic probiotics and a company with integrity!
customer_reviews.text: Seem like great probiotics. The pearls are SUPER EASY to swallow, dont really have a taste. Havent checked independent testing but are said to have the shown level of probiotics at the best by date, which means better before then, an honest and classy move!
customer_reviews.author: Sensual Sojourn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: "This is a fantastic product and I'm glad I purchased it. I was having a lot of stomach issues and my stomach hurt almost all of the time. After taking for about 2 weeks this Probiotic/Prebiotic has helped tremendously. My stomach pain is seldom and I hardly have any more gas. This company is fantastic at customer service and I'm always happy to support small businesses!!"
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Gas and the such lol are much better after taking 2 a day for about 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 28 years old and I've ordered hundreds of products online and usually don't write reviews but this deserves it. Bloating, Gas and the such lol are much better after taking 2 a day for about 2 weeks now. Love this product and hope it never changes and stays around. I've tried several different probiotics and none have worked like this. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I experience several digestive issues and have tried numerous probiotics. My husband began researching different products that would help me and he stumbled upon these "pearls". And I'm so thankful he did..... as I've told him these should be called "diamonds" instead of "pearls" because they have become this girl's best friend! It took about a week to ten days, but they work! Thank you..... I'll be adding these to my daily "must have regimen". I highly recommend these "pearls / diamonds".
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A.

customer_reviews.title: DOCTOR Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much I have been using these already and now I got three more they really do work thank you so very much my doctor Dr.vliet set up I was going to get probiotics I should get and highly recommended Earth‘s Pearls and to get them from Amazon ! A big thank you to Amazon and Dr. Elizabeth Vliet! And of course thank you so very much for making excellent product Earth’s Pearls
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wells

customer_reviews.title: These are life changing 😄
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled with chronic constipation and foul smelling gas for years. I received my pearls on Sunday and took 2. By Monday morning I had evacuated my bowels. Then again on Tuesday. I know this sounds gross, but I’m so happy to be having complete BMs instead of pellets. My smelly gas has also dissipated along with belly bloat. I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been taking these Probiotic & Prebiotic for 2 months and we just reordered another 2-month supply. He said that, since he has been taking these, his stomach hasn’t bothered him at all. We will definitely continue to order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Helping me live a normal life
customer_reviews.text: I tried these Pearls because I was having trouble digesting regular food, bloated easily, and was very gassy. Within 48 hours the gas stopped (after being a problem for YEARS), and I no longer bloat. I feel slimmer, and am living like a normal person now. Great stuff!!! Research suggested taking the pearl with Metamucil, as they work well together. Have definitely found it to be true.
customer_reviews.author: GKC

customer_reviews.title: More Effective than Most
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't found any probiotics on the market to be as effective as Plexus, I find this brand to be more effective than any other brand I have tried, and they are affordable. The company also sent me a coupon for 99% off my next bottle after my first purchase! Good product, good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to notice a difference but no issues either
customer_reviews.text: I believe it’s too soon to write a review on this product,but I keep receiving emails so I will. I have not really noticed any significant difference in my digestive health at this point,but I have not had any problems either. I believe it takes some time for supplements to actually know if they are helping,it’s hard to understand how anyone can write reviews after taking something for a few days...I will update when I finish these.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It is not the best probiotic I've ever taken. I've had some that seem a bit more complete. However all of those were with nitrogen sealed bubble pop nonsense. I'll take a little less hassle for a still satisfactory result. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cross

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck in throat
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for a 2 star review is because it’s extremely difficult to swallow these. They’re not very big in size but maybe from the round shape and density? I take with plenty of water but they seem to get stuck in my throat. I tried powering through them but too late to return so I’m throwing the rest away. I don’t think you would suffocate from this because of the size but it’s a very uneasy feeling having anything stuck in your throat... for me anyways. Might work for others, just not for me. Just be aware
customer_reviews.author: Christine Phrakaysone

customer_reviews.title: Must have if taking antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I take one a day regularly, but double the dose when I have to take twice a day antibiotics for a sinus infection and it really alleviates the digestion problems that result from amoxicillin wiping out your GI flora. Take in the middle of the interval between taking the antibiotics, not at the same time or the antibiotics just immediately fights the probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: George M Sagen

customer_reviews.title: Small pill but hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure of the effectiveness of these pills as it did not seem to help compared to other products I've taken. What's worse is the hardness of the pills and the tendency for it to get stuck in my throat. There appears to be no coating on the pill which makes it harder to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: MKK

customer_reviews.title: I did not know what it was like to live without bloating
customer_reviews.text: I have had a troubled gut for so long, I did not know what it was like to live without bloating, gas, and difficulty doing my business on the toilet. I have tried all kinds of probiotics. I've only been using Earth's Pearl for a few weeks. I can't say that it is wondrous and 100% effective. Probably nothing is. But it has radically reduced my gut symptoms to a level that is very close to normal. I will continue to use it and hope I can continue to get good results. My gut depends on it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The only one that WORKED!
customer_reviews.text: I am actually shocked how this pearl has made such a difference in my life. I have had serious embarrassing gas issues and bloating for quite a few years, despite having a very good diet. Nothing and I do mean that nothing ever worked!!! I started this about a month ago and the results were astounding! No horrid gas issues, and no bloating. I Highly Recommend this Pre/pro biotic.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself after an intense round of antibiotics that left me sick. I ended up loving them, so much so, that my mom actually swiped them from me. I am currently on my second bottle and definitely intend to repurchase. They’re easy to swallow, they have no taste (which is great, because so many of them have a horrid taste), and they’re a wonderful supplement for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: does a fabulous job in helping my gut biome
customer_reviews.text: "great product 2nd time i have ordered, i have ibs and take opiod pain meds which irritate my intestines, i no longer need stool softners when i take these"
customer_reviews.author: bea hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Helped with IBS symptoms......
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia & IBS is one of the 'wonderful' things that come along with it, so was advised to take probiotics, but haven't really found any that made much difference-until now. I ordered this & faithfully took it every day & after a few weeks, I started noticing that I wasn't having the 'issues' that I normally had. I haven't changed anything else, so I'm convinced that these have helped. I just took my last one, so I will be putting an order in right away for another supply.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was having difficulty swallowing these tablets first thing in the morning, but once I adjusted my schedule, and had an adequate amount of fluids beforehand, I had no other issues. Prior to taking these I had numerous days of severe bloating with abdominal tenderness, some times feeling like I was 9 months pregnant. Since starting these, I haven't had any of these days.
customer_reviews.author: amh7654

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS CRAP DO NOT BUY IT - IT MIGHT WORK FOR A COW
customer_reviews.author: Dana Acord

product_meta.title: 60 Day Supply – Earth’s Pearl Probiotic & Prebiotic – for Women, Men and Kids - Advanced Digestive Gut Health and Enzyme Support - One a Day Pearls - Billions of Live Cultures
product_meta.description:
For many, a probiotic is a nutrition essential. In order to increase the bacterial profile of your stomach, this supplement works to introduce billions of live microflora, or beneficial bacteria, to settle and grow in your GI tract.

Eases Digestive Distress 

Digestive health plays a huge part in the overall health of your body. These 60-count bottles of probiotic pearls works to improve energy and mood by optimizing the bioavailability of the nutrients from the food that you eat. The prebiotic in this supplement, fructooligosaccharides, (FOS), act as the food source for the probiotics, so they will be able to have more widespread and long-lasting effectiveness.

Food is, of course, one of the most important sources of nutrients for the body. This probiotic works to uninhibit all of the nutrients you get from food from giving your body the full benefits it deserves.

Boost Other Body Systems 

The long-term benefits of this ultimate gut flora probiotic are striking, and may include: immune system support, relief from gastrointestinal distress, prevents yeast growth, increased energy, and a better mood.

Easy to Swallow

These probiotics are not coated like a capsule, because of their patented one of a kind delivery system. Because of that, these pearls have the texture of a "Smarties" candy. If you have difficulty swallowing, suck on them for a few seconds and then with water or your favorite beverage, they will slide right down.

Gentle while still remaining effective and safe not only for men and women, but also for big kids.

Scientifically formulated with top quality ingredients in a NSF & GMP-Certified facility and third-party tested for potency and purity to ensure you get the maximum benefits with every dosage.

Kindly Note: these supplements may contain traces of milk protein.


Improve your digestive health today! Click Add to Cart Now!!!
feature_bullets: PROBIOTIC & PREBIOTIC FORMULA: Probiotics are beneficial bacteria that are found in specific foods or supplements, while prebiotics are types of fiber that feed friendly bacteria already in the digestive system. Essentially, the FOS Prebiotic in these Pearl supplements help the good bacteria that your digestive tract needs to fire on all cylinders, providing you with balanced protection and relief.

EASES DIGESTIVE DISTRESS: These supplements are specifically designed to provide relief from bloating and gas pain and are also formulated to help prevent future problems from arising. Additionally, these pearls are designed to provide time-released relief, so you can simply take 1 in the morning and feel relief throughout the entire day.

BENEFICIAL BACTERIA: Did you know there is such a thing as healthy gut bacteria? It’s true! Gut healthy microbiota plays a few important roles, including crowding out unhealthy bacteria, increasing the absorption of minerals, and improving overall health. The bifidobacterium are the major genera of bacteria that make up the GI tract and are one of the main ingredients present in this supplement.

INNOVATIVE PEARL DESIGN: The innovative pearl form has the texture of a “Smarties” candy. Suck on it for a few seconds to make it incredibly easy to swallow. It also makes them 15 times more effective than your average capsule because it delivers 15 times more live bacteria directly to the source (intestinal tract). Our pearl probiotics are one of a kind because the delivery systems of this design acts like no other can.

WHO WE ARE: Here, at Earth’s Pearl, we understand that every “body” is different, that is why we offer a 365 Day Money Back Guarantee, because we have found that what works for one may not always work for another. So much in our bodies relies on the function of our gastrointestinal tracts. That’s why we are dedicated to providing probiotics for all stages of life, so everyone can have a healthy digestive system, and by extension, a healthy body.
